title: Set up a Private Dining Room
description: A VIP guest has requested a private dining experience in a separate room.

tasks.description: Book the private dining room in the event management system for the requested date and time.
Work with the guest to create a custom, pre-set menu for their dinner.
tasks.expected_outcome: A custom menu is created and added to the event order.

tasks.description: Create a BEO for the event, assigning a dedicated server and notifying the kitchen of the special menu.
tasks.expected_outcome: A BEO is created and distributed to ensure flawless execution.
